column4: HELP PLZ!!!! my ubuntu dosent load its stuck in terminal the Gnome interface is not loading what do i do i thing i screwed my sys by installing some other softwares like gdesklets PLZ help ME
do you get any error
what happens when you type sudo /etc/init.d/gdm start
No it loads the begging and then its ask me to login(not the graphical interface) like in Terminal and then it shows user@ubuntu$ and then i am stuck in terminal mode only
i didnt try this type sudo /etc/init.d/gdm start will this command work
GDM is the graphical login
could be that your xorg.conf has been changed and wont work
I dont get the GDM login at all and thats the problem how do i fix it
ya u may be rite xorg.conf file may be changed i am new to linux and i dont know how to reverse it can u help me
well it could also mean the damoen isn't loading just try /etc/init.d/gdm start and see if gdm starts
if the xorg.conf has changed the only advise i can really give is to type X and see what the error messgae is
someones going to have to see the error from X to fix the problem
pontu, i typed X and this screen comes up and shows a funny 4 cornered mouse and a 8-bit graphic screen
pontu, i mean only the screen is there and nothing else
ok press ctrl-alt and backspace at the same time and that screen will disapear, your xorg.conf is fine
what happens if you just type 'gdm' or /etc/init.d/xdm start
pontu, ya i also pressed the zlt-ctrl+bkspance and i came back to the previous screen but some diffrent lines i observed sayin that some graphic couldnt be loaded or some thing like that
pontu, i didnt try typing gdm or /etc/init/d/xdm start
pontu, do u want me to try running these commands
yea try that ?
ok i will try it i will am now on the live disk i will reboot and if i have ne problems i will come back to u,, ne ways how long will u stay here?
for a while,
Has anyone experianced a problem while installing the AMD64 5.10 Relese when an error 'Not installing to unclean target
ne way thanx for all ur help
